input.sentences: it was a cold morning at -17 degrees celsius .
we had to close the trails for safety .
the pine trees were white with snow .
we used the tractor to clear the trails .
it was going to take all day to clear the snow away .
output.sentences: Woke up to the negative degrees cold today.
For our safety the trails were closed.
The trees sure do look beautiful with the white snow on them.
We used the tractor to clean up some of the trails.
Over all it was the perfect snow day.
